title: gdb:Python Exception <class 'gdb.error'> There is no member named status
body:
At the iirst i meet the problem is gdb  No struct type named runtime.rtype, and i follow the tips  in the issue:
https://github.com/golang/go/issues/9326
Problem:
i use the common command is okay , but when i use some command about goroutine is wrong ...
and the problem like this.

(gdb) info goroutines
Python Exception <class 'gdb.error'> There is no member named status.: 
Error occurred in Python command: There is no member named status.
(gdb)  goroutine 1 bt
Python Exception <class 'gdb.error'> There is no member named status.: 
Error occurred in Python command: There is no member named status.



my environment is : 
Linux/CentOS 7.1
golang 1.4.2
gdb GNU gdb (GDB) Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7.6.1-64.el7
